typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'excel',
	container: 'testgitcontainer',
	fileName: 'ChristelleTest.xlsx',
	sheetName: '2021 Jan-Feb All columns Air Co',
	firstRowAsHeader: true) ~> source1
source1 derive() ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 lookup(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
